HOW_TO_CHOOSE_SIZE.TITLE: How to choose the size?
HOW_TO_CHOOSE_SIZE.CONTENT:
* If the Og value falls into the interdimensional interval, for example, Og = 98cm (between 48 and 50 sizes), then when choosing a size, be guided by the comparative data From and About, choosing the size up or down. If in your figure the difference between O and O is within 4 - 12 cm, then in the group of shoulder products it is more convenient to adjust the pattern selected according to O (as is customary in dimensional typology). It is recommended to choose a group of belt products by About and adjust by From in the zone of waist darts, in reliefs and side seams. 

** Growth groups ** in double heights: 158-164 includes heights from 155 cm to 167 cm, 170- 176 includes heights from 168 cm to 179 cm.The difference in length in the products is about 6-7 cm at the bottom (long models, trousers) and about 4 cm along the length of the sleeve. 155 cm to 167 cm, 170-176 includes heights from 168 cm to 179 cm.The difference in lengths in the products is about 6-7 cm at the bottom
